titleStmt.title: Rupes Israelis: = The rock of Israel. A little part of its glory laid forth in a sermon preached at Margarets in Westminster before the honorable House of Commons, at their monthly fast, Apr. 24. 1644. By Edmund Staunton, D.D. minister at Kingston upon Thames, in the county of Surrey, a member of the Assembly of Divines.
titleStmt.author: Staunton, Edmund, 1600-1671.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Christopher Meredith, dwelling at the Crane in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
